website_summaries.verdict: Adequate for single people or couples, but you may want a larger machine for larger households.
cons: Although it boasts "EZ mount installation," most people will still need a professional for power connection

customer_reviews.title: GE GFC320V  Disposall bearing failure in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the 10-year old GE GFC320V with a new one 2 years ago ... make it easy and cost efficient. I only place light loads sparingly in my disposer since I hadn't had one in a couple of decades or more before the one I replaced. My experience with GE products is very inconsistent similar to this experience. Time to move onto an unrelated mfr. this time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to install as discribed.
customer_reviews.text: The unit was as expected, but the installation instructions left out a key part of the install steps. The seal ring only needs to be positioned on the extension piece to encompass the first ring of the rubber seal. If the ring is pushed up all the way, you cannot connect the disposal to the extension. It took several hours to figure out what I was doing wrong, but when the rubber seal was properly placed the unit went in without any further issues. It is a quiet operating disposal, and my client was very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Crockford

customer_reviews.title: Good disposal at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed to replace an older model that was no longer functional. Installation took about 30 minutes because it is not corded, and it works perfectly. However, the collar to mount it was broken when my plumber opened it. He was able to use the old part from the previous model so I did not have to take the trouble to return it and wait for a new one. Not as loud as the previous one. Best price I found anywhere. Not giving 5 stars because of broken part.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Mccrory

customer_reviews.title: Great Disposal - see edit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and quiet disposal. Be aware that it does not come with a power cord. Be sure to add a General Electric PM3X215 Disposer Power Cord Kit to your cart or you will be disappointed once it arrives. Edit: Bumping it down a star. I forgot to pop out the knock out plug so my dishwasher would drain properly. The modeling was not done correctly and I could not "knock it out". I had to drill the hole open in order for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Rating is not a reflection of seller.....
customer_reviews.text: I have installed several disposals and this one was a B*%CH!! I could not get it to attach to the piece that it is suppose to twist onto. Ended up giving it to my brother who is a plumber for him to install somewhere else and got an Insinkerator which attached with NO problem. The GE may work well (haven't talked to my brother about it) but if it can't be mounted under a sink, I may never know. I had absolutely no problem with the seller, the product is what I ordered and was shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NCYBOND

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: After 6 years our garbage disposal finally broke. Luckily we found this same product on amazon. Needed it quick and it arrived within 2days. It was very easy to install. It works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for origional disposal
customer_reviews.text: I choose this model/Brand as a direct replacement for an original unit installed when the condo was built. Lightning blew out this, and my neighbor's unit on the same day. I installed this on myself.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: didn't even last 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I make it a point to use a catcher to capture most of the food waste to toss into the trash. there is a very small amount of food that actually makes it way into the disposable. Yet, after less than 5 years the unit is dead. Tried everything from the allen wrench to disconnecting to trying to unlodge from the top. very disappointing for the price, and that it is a GE product.
customer_reviews.author: avp

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Great price! Would buy this brand again:) Did take a couple of hours to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, especially when exchanging like for like. All the connections and wiring were a snap - 30 minutes max to install.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Davis

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement for any GFC320 (nonmatter the letter at the end)
customer_reviews.text: Direct fit replacement for my GFC320F. Easy as 1-2-3 and for a great compared to any of my local hardware stores.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Tirado

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an older worn out model
customer_reviews.text: The directions could have been a little clearer, but other than that it was a good replacement . It has been about a month and it is still working. Delivered on time. The old was rusted out and made a high deafening noise.
customer_reviews.author: Becca B

customer_reviews.title: Great Dsposal and great price, and a big saving compared to Home Depot & Lowes.
customer_reviews.text: I also replaced this with a prior GE dishwasher that was installed in 2003. Like previous reviewer's suggestion, I wired the fan prior to mounting. This was a great project and not too difficult. I did have to go run out to get plumbers putty, be sure to buy a small container before you start.
customer_reviews.author: Dani The Man 16

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This disposal works quite well, especially for the price. It is not as quiet as I expected and sound different than any other disposal I have had. The sound had me thinking it was not working properly at first, but after Googling it I found the sound was normal for it and from that point on I have been very happy with it. It is much stronger than one would think for a 1/3 HP unit. While the sound is different than most disposals it is not unpleasant I like the disposal a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkertoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Putting the disposal in took two people. It was a tight fit though and no leaks. Very low noise when running.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dingess

customer_reviews.title: Compact & quiet, very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Compact & quiet. Nice unit for yacht, RV or Apartment. WE replaced one we had on our yacht with this one. Super easy to install. Quiet and efficient. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betka Wetka

customer_reviews.title: Return window closed to soon
customer_reviews.text: I had a leaking disposal which needed to be replaced. As everyone knows, it is so hard to get someone to come into my home to replace it. Now that had the disposal is the wrong size. My return window is closed so now I have a disposal that I can not use and have to purchase a new one from my local Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Young

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for my old disposal. Didn’t have to change or adjust the plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: BigDawgJN

customer_reviews.title: Basic cheap disposal - be careful
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with its own cord, basic construction. I was disappointed to see that there is no external hex on the drive (my old worn out disposal had it), so if the impeller jams I can't use the hex drive ... I'll need to take it apart. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this quickly and without problems. Runs very quiet; I am not used to that! Glad I found. This is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: Not same serial number as picture but did replace old one with minimal work
customer_reviews.author: Leonard LaBrake

customer_reviews.title: GE Disposall gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this disposal to replace my 9 year old GE Disposall because the configuration was the same, meaning I wouldn't have to repipe under the sink. The new GE had all parts needed except for the power cord. Removal of the cord and installation into the new Disposall was easy. Also installation under the sink was easy too. Works great and is quieter than original Disposall.
customer_reviews.author: a6sense

customer_reviews.title: It is quiet and work perfectly like a plug an play system
customer_reviews.text: It replaced my previous GE disposal with same hardware that lasted 13 yrs before coming apart..It is quiet and work perfectly like a plug an play system. I am very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and low noise
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy to install (if this is a replacement). Much less noise than my old one and better performance with less horse power.
customer_reviews.author: TIM

customer_reviews.title: Not one of the better disposals on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could use better installation diagrams. It is a disposal unit!!!! What do you think I used it for? Making coffee? Ceiling fan replacement?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: My last unit worked for well over ten years. Hopefully this one follows suit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Because it is not as big as the old one it was easy to position and, once installed, there is a bit more space under the sink for the pot lids. It does fine as a disposal and seems to eat things faster than the Kenmore it replaced. Quieter too but that may be a comparison of new bearings with old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Datahawk

customer_reviews.title: The General Electric GFC320V 1/3 Horsepower is excellent. It serves my needs perfectly since I am ...
customer_reviews.text: The General Electric GFC320V 1/3 Horsepower is excellent. It serves my needs perfectly since I am a household of only one. My previous GE garbage disposal lasted thirteen years. I look forward to many years using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia R. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good light/medium duty disposal
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the builder grade unit and this one works great for light/medium duty. Very easy install.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement and it was exactly what was needed.

customer_reviews.title: No problems yet..this was my exactly the same make and model as original.
customer_reviews.text: A friend installed for me but it seemed easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: This matched the disposal which was currently installed but was damaged. It was an easy swap and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price, for a small unit, in a small kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy install. The hard wiring set up is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Matched up with my old Disposall model's pipe set up. Fairly easy install. The hard wiring set up is a little awkward, but I made it work.

customer_reviews.text: Replaced similar unit, installation was not difficult. so far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This food disposal work great so far and is very quiet. We use everything and I must say my wife have not complaint so far.

customer_reviews.title: Thank You but it is working FINE!!
customer_reviews.text: The elbow was to short, I had to modify it to make it work. COMMENT: when changing over an old Part to a New Part make sure that All the Parts are the same because the pumping hadn't change under the sink. Thank You but it is working FINE!!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this GE disposal easily. If installing on a porcelain sink, be sure to get plumbing putty for a tight seal. We have had no problems with it. This disposal was a replacement for an identical one that we've had for 8 years. Works like a charm.

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This product was easy to install which is a huge help when you are not a plumber.

customer_reviews.text: Had to use the old drain fitting, the one supplied with the unit did not extend distance needed to match up with the drain. Also had to use one of the old gasket rubber washers for it to match up. Other than that it seems to work fine.

customer_reviews.title: Biggest disappointment super tooth buddy
customer_reviews.text: Those are my ratings after using the products. Biggest disappointment super tooth buddy.

customer_reviews.title: General Electric GD
customer_reviews.text: The unit was defective from Mccombs Supply Co and I returned it. I had to pay $17.00 additional shipping to send to send it back which I don't feel I should have to pay. I had to go to Lowe's and purchase a brand new BADGER unit which works great. I have all GE products in my home and I love them, but this was unacceptable. Something should be done and I would like my money refunded since I had no control over the problem. Thank you. Sincerely, Linda A. Sundermeyer

customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly and works as it should. My neighbor was able to easily install it. The cost was great!

customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to replace your faulty disposer; This is the one to get! The basic instructions are user friendly for anyone.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this disposal to replace a GE disposal that was installed by builder 10 years ago. The hardest part was removing the old unit. I choose the GE because it is a name I trust and I thought the replacement would connect without electrical or plumbing changes. The new unit is very quiet and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The part came in about 4 days after I ordered it. The set up was quite simple (although it took me all day to set up, mostly due to my previous one being stuck on.) I have had the product for a month now and I have had no problems. I would highly recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelz

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this disposal as a replacement when I purchased a new home. It was the newest version of the old disposal. It feeds very slowly and is EXTREMELY loud. Will never buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bass

product_meta.title: General Electric GFC320N Continuous Feed Disposall, Large capacity, 1/3 horsepower, Black
product_meta.description:
The GFC320N garbage disposal by GE. The disposal's powerful grinding action reduces food waste to small particles, making the unit safe for any properly sized septic system.

AMAZON.COM


Large-capacity continuous-feed food-waste disposal with 1/3-horsepower motor. 
view larger 1/3-HORSEPOWER CONTINUOUS-FEED FOOD-WASTE DISPOSAL 
HELPS TAKE CARE OF THE DIRTY WORK
Send food waste down the drain once and for all with this large-capacity GFC320V garbage disposal by GE. The disposal's powerful grinding action reduces food waste to small particles, making the unit safe for any properly sized septic system.

Even more, the food-waste disposal features an advanced insulation package that helps ensure super-quiet operation, making it possible to maintain the cheerful, festive mood of a successful dinner party even during cleanup. Hardworking, quiet, and easy to install--the GE disposal makes a useful addition to any busy kitchen.

CONVENIENT DESIGN
Thoughtfully constructed, the food-waste disposal system also provides a two-level precutter, an on/off wall-switch with a sink stopper, a manual-reset overload protector, a splashguard, and a direct-wire power connection, as well as stainless-steel, jam-resistant, dual-swivel impellers. Other highlights include cold-rolled carbon-steel armature shaft material, a stainless-steel sink flange, and a galvanized-steel turntable.

EASY-TO-USE CONTINUOUS FEED
To operate, simply remove the sink stopper, turn on a medium flow of cold water, flip the switch to ON, and scrape in the food waste. The continuous-feed disposal takes care of the rest. Before turning the disposal off, let the water and the disposal run for about 25 seconds after the shredding and grinding stops to ensure all waste is thoroughly flushed through the trap and drain.

The disposal measures 5.19 inches deep by 5.5 inches wide by 12.69 inches high, and detailed installation instructions come included.

GFC320V AT A GLANCE:
 * 1/3-horsepower motor
 * Large-capacity continuous-feed disposer
 * Over 2500 RPM grinding action*
 * Stainless-steel jam-resistant, dual-swivel impellers
 * EZ mount installation
 * Direct-wire power connection
 * Standard sound-insulation package
 * Cold-rolled carbon-steel armature shaft material
 * Splashguard
 * Wall-switch with sink stopper
 * Manual reset overload protector
 * Dishwasher drain connector
 * Stainless-steel sink flange
 * Galvanized-steel turntable
 * 2-level precutter

* Based on RPM testing of cleared GE and competitive models



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
GE continuous feed food waste disposer has a high RPM and high torque, to grind food finer and faster. Which is really a big deal. Since select GE Disposal disposers can reach speeds of over 3500 RPM, while many brands can't reach over 2000 RPM, the Disposal disposers are less likely to jam. And, stainless-steel dual-swivel grinder blades means they're less likely to corrode, even after years of use. The Disposal offers a faster and finer grind right from the beginning. Now you can be free from the anti-jam key and able to power through food the first time, so you don't waste time. Installation made E-Z. E-Z Mount System makes installation a breeze for anyone. We have fewer parts and steps than most of our competitors' installation systems. The five-step installation starts by attaching a sink flange assembly. Then, the disposer snaps onto the sink flange under your sink, allowing water and waste to safely travel down the pipes. And, the Disposal easily attaches to your existing plumbing and wiring. After a quick installation, you can trust that your Disposal was made with stainless steel and corrosion-resistant materials for maximum lifespan and durability. Drain boost technology helps keep your drain free and clear of food waste to ensure your water runs smoothly in the right direction. The Disposal has an angled fin which pumps water and ground food through pipes with higher speed and pressure to keep drains purged and help reduce clogs. All our models operate quietly and some even offer sound reduction technology. The sound reduction package includes a fully insulated sound shell, so our disposers can handle your toughest challenges while minimizing noise. Did you know that Americans throw away nearly 25-Percent of all food prepared. And decomposing waste in landfills is one of the largest producers of methane gas, which is the main contributor of global warming It's true.

See more
feature_bullets: Compatible with various GE brand models
Refer to you manual to ensure ordering the correct, compatible part
